page.title: 18LAVENDON VILLAGE
page.content:
Lavendon is a very noisy village because of the busy Northampton Road. This is a very dangerous, twisty road and there have been several crashes recently.. There is a Post-Office and general shop, a Village Hall, two pubs and a church. We have a school, but it is not very large. In the village we have clubs for football and cricket, with six snooker tables at the Youth Club. This also has table tennis and a pool table. The village won an award for The Best-Kept Village recently and we all try to keep it tidy.
Dominic Green 2D Age 11. .
